list.name: Changes
list.comment:
docs: add pinned requirements and document dependencies in README
- add requirements.txt as single source of truth for dependencies - document runtime and test dependencies in README - align local, Docker and CI environments

task.summary:
feat: turn project skeleton into fully testable user management system
- implement full user CRUD API using FastAPI - add PostgreSQL persistence with SQLAlchemy ORM - enforce data integrity via unique email constraint - introduce deterministic API tests with database reset per test - add health endpoint and explicit readiness waiting for stable test execution - provide minimal web UI only for critical UI test coverage - dockerize app, tests and database for identical local and CI execution - fix missing runtime dependency required for EmailStr validation

feat: stabilize UI tests and integrate Allure reporting
- fix UI test scope to validate user intent instead of backend state - resolve flaky UI assertions by removing implicit data assumptions - add Allure reporting for API and UI tests - attach screenshots on UI test failures - ensure pytest markers are properly registered in containers - fix missing runtime dependencies in app container - align local and container test execution for reproducibility

ci: finalize GitHub Actions pipeline with Docker-based test execution
- trigger CI on pull requests, main branch pushes, and manual dispatch - run API tests as hard quality gate - execute minimal UI test suite after API validation - collect Allure results as CI artifacts - ensure clean startup and teardown of services

docs: add pinned requirements and document dependencies in README
- add requirements.txt as single source of truth for dependencies - document runtime and test dependencies in README - align local, Docker and CI environments
